metadata.Title: CVE-2014-8960 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - medium
metadata.Description: Cross-site scripting (XSS) vulnerability in libraries/error_report.lib.phpin the error-reporting feature in phpMyAdmin 4.1.x before 4.1.14.7 and4.2.x before 4.2.12 allows remote authenticated users to inject arbitraryweb script or HTML via a crafted filename.

criterions.comment: phpmyadmin: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue (note: 'end of standard support').
